long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QR Scan Pro is your go-to Chrome extension for effortless QR code scanning directly from any website. Say goodbye to the hassle of taking screenshots and uploading images to external QR code readers. With QR Scan Pro, seamlessly scan QR codes on the fly, saving you time and simplifying the process. This user-friendly extension ensures a smooth experience, allowing you to access information swiftly and efficiently. Best of all, it's free forever! Elevate your QR code scanning experience with QR Scan Pro and enjoy the convenience of quick, direct scans without any additional steps.

Key Features:

- Instant QR code scanning directly from websites.
- Streamlined process without the need for screenshots.
- User-friendly interface for a seamless experience.
- Enhance efficiency and save time.
- Forever free, making QR Scan Pro an essential tool for everyone!
